FuncDef:
The ripng split-horizon command enables split horizon for RIPng Update packets.
The undo ripng split-horizon command disables split horizon for RIPng Update packets.
By default, split horizon is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Split horizon is used to prevent routing loops. With split horizon, the routes learned through an interface are prevented from being advertised through this interface. To enable split horizon, run the ripng split-horizon command.
Enabling split horizon for RIPng is recommended.
Precautions
If both split horizon and poison reverse are configured, only poison reverse takes effect.
